channel.title: Tools on Product Manager Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Product Manager Playbook

item.title: Analytics Tools
item.description: Tools for product analytics, experimentation, and data-informed decision-making.

item.title: Collaboration Tools
item.description: Collaboration tools that enable Product Managers to work effectively with designers, engineers, stakeholders, and distributed teams.

item.title: Delivery Tools
item.description: Tools that support product delivery, execution, and team coordination from planning to release.

item.title: Discovery Tools
item.description: Product discovery tools that help Product Managers research user needs, validate assumptions, and test solutions early.
